dmca.title: holysmoke.org
dmca.body:
Dear [website owner]:

Please be advised that this office has been retained to represent [PRIVATE]. It has come to our attention that your web site is hosting documentation authored
by [PRIVATE] in which [PRIVATE] has maliciously slandered my clients
by, among other things, accusing them of engaging in criminal activity.

Please let this letter serve as a formal demand that any such material be
immediately removed from your web-site as your continued publication of the
defamatory material after this letter will be viewed by my clients as a
conscious decision and specific intent on your part to also slander my
client which will be met with the exercise of any and all of my clients'
legal remedies.

In the event that you are not the person responsible for the website's
content, I ask that you please forward this letter to the appropriate
person. Thank you for your kind attention.

Very Truly Yours,


[attorney]
dmca.sender_name: LAW OFFICES OF RICHARD A. MARCUS
